anyOf.description: Access rules for the section. Section will be marked reachable (green) if all rules are matched. If rules in [] are matched, the section will be marked as reachable with glitches (yellow). If rules in {} are matched, the section will be marked as checkable (blue). Children will always inherit rules from parents. Each entry will be OR-ed together, comma sperated rules will be AND-ed.

Access rules for the section. Section will be marked reachable (green) if all rules are matched. If rules in [] are matched, the section will be marked as reachable with glitches (yellow). If rules in {} are matched, the section will be marked as checkable (blue). Children will always inherit rules from parents. 2-Dimensional array of rules, first dimenstion will be OR-ed together, second will be AND-ed.

items.description: List of rules to be AND-ed together.

chest_unopened_img.description: Image for all not cleared sections in this location. Children/sections can override this.

chest_opened_img.description: Image for all cleared sections in this location. Children/sections can override this.

map.description: The map identifier of the map for the location to be on.

x.description: X (horizontal) position on the map in pixels relative to the maps image.

y.description: Y (vertical) position on the map in pixels relative to the maps image.

size.description: Overrides the location size defined on the map.

border_thickness.description: Overrides the location border thickness defined on the map.

overlay_background.description: Background color of the overlay text displaying the number of unopened chest in sections.

parent.description: Overrides the locations parent. Needs a valid location code.

children.description: Child locations of this location. Children will inherit all rules.

sections.description: Sections of this location. Sections will inherit all rules.
